item.title: Date Everything! launches June 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/date-everything-launches-june-17

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Physical edition to follow.

Sandbox dating simulation game Date Everything! will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 17, publisher Team17 and developer Sassy Chap Games announced. A physical edition will launch sometime after.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Date Everything! brings an exciting new twist on the dating simulator genre. Your BFA in customer service unfortunately goes to waste as you lose your job to AI. But… a mysterious stranger sends a gift—magical glasses called “dateviators”—which make your house come alive and dateable!

Each dateable object will open up, have their own stories and potentially become your lovers, friends, or enemies. With an exhaustive Who’s Who of voice actors keeping you company on your journey!

Key Features

  • 100 fully voiced datable characters for players to fall madly in love with.
  • Branching dialogue that leads to multiple endings for each character.
  • Over four hours of music with each dateable character featuring their own theme.
  • Over 11,000 hand-drawn images.
  • 1.2 million words and 70,000 voiced lines.
  • A fully interactive 3d overworld that changes based on choices made in the playthrough.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
